title: Binary Tree
description: This multi-part coding challenge is part of the first week of my course: "Intelligence and Learning." Here I attempt to implement a classic data structure: The Binary Search Tree.

timestamps.title: Why would you use a binary tree?
Algorithm for how the tree is sorted
Use prototype to add an addNode function
Deal with the case when two values are equal
How do you traverse the tree?
What does it mean to visit a node?
Add a function to search the tree
Add a x and y position to each node
Draw a line between the nodes

codeExamples.title: Binary Search Tree
codeExamples.description: This sketch implements a binary tree search algorithm.

codeExamples.title: Visualizing a Binary Tree
codeExamples.description: This sketch visualizes a binary tree.
